label.name: Description
label.description: Short sentence describing the resource and providing the most important aspects.

label.name: Source or reference
label.description: Journal citation, book reference, etc. sufficient to locate the resource.

label.name: Applicable region(s)
label.description: Geographic region(s) where the resource is relevant.Default should be "Global." Up to 3 regions can be added below.

label.name: Uploadable without permissions?
label.description: Can the resource be uploaded and distributed freely?

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of biography
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

settings.setting: The title of the resource, should be sufficient for user to select it as relevant.
